overview:
Ali Sanan is a Professional Web Developer, Blogger and Software Engineer, He owns www.actionthoughts.com and writes articles about latest technology advancement.

Along with his web development experience, he has also good grip on Microsoft SQL Server, Databases and Transact SQL.

He has also mastered Microsoft Dynamics Retail Management System. His complete set of skills\ interests includes:

SQL Server 2000-2008 VB.NET Microsoft Dynamics Windows 7 Linux Excel VBScript Blogging Google Photoshop Flash HTML + CSS cPanel
